products.title: Splash Smokey Purple Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash smokey purple panel blind in purple. Made to measure from 36.61 with free uk mainland delivery. This panel blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their moisture-resistant splash smokey purple panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The rich purple panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm, saturated shade. 
 
As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,.5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make. A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design. 
 
Panel blinds add a really modern feel to any space and at swift direct blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of their free 5 year guarantee, which means investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.  
 
 Product id: db-pan0235 fabric colour: smokey purple material: 100% polyester headrail: white aluminium 5 channel track   control type: cord or wand energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Splash Sloe Purple Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash sloe purple panel blind in purple. Made to measure from 36.61 with free uk mainland delivery. This panel blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their splash sloe purple panel blinds is a quick and stylish way to fill a space. This purple dimout fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing. 
 
 At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This soft purple panel blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. 
 
 Product id: db-pan0226 fabric colour: sloe material: 100% polyester headrail: white aluminium 5 channel track   control type: cord or wand energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes
